atae/saab0509/P528252
{NA₄}KIŠIB Sakip-Aššur DUMU {m}{d}PA-MU-x x Bel MI₂ SUM-a-ni   {MI₂}{d}gu-la-um-me 03 ru-ṭu u₂-piš-ma {m}DUG₃.GA-IM-KA₂-hi ina ŠA₃-bi Adad GIN₂ KU₃.UD TA IGI Sakip-Aššur {LU₂}LUNGA 0 il-qi kas-pu ga-mur ta-di-ni MI₂ šu-a-tu₂ zar-pat la-qi-at tu-a-ru de-nu DUG₄.DUG₄ la-a-ši man-nu ša₂ ina ur-kiš ina ma-ti-me lu-u Sakip-Aššur lu-u DUMU.MEŠ-šu₂ lu-u PAB.MEŠ-šu₂ ša de-e-nu DUG₄.DUG₄ TA {m}DUG₃-IM-KA₂-hi u₃ DUMU.MEŠ-šu₂ ub-ta-u-ni kas-pu a-na 10.MEŠ ana EN-šu₂ GUR ina de-ni-šu₂ DUG₄.DUG₄-ma la i-laq-qi ṣib-tu₂ be-en-nu ana 01-me UD.MEŠ sa-ar-tu₂ ana DU₃ MU.AN.NA.MEŠ  IGI x x x x x x x IGI x x x x x x x IGI {m}ARAD-x x x x x x IGI x x x x x x x IGI x x x x x x x IGI x x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x IGI x x x x x x x Nisannu UD-24 lim-mu La-basi
